import React, { Component } from "react"; import "../Styles/App.css"; class Members extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.shuffle = (array) => { for (let i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { let j = Math.floor(Math.random() * (i + 1)); [array[i], array[j]] = [array[j], array[i]]; } return array; }; this.state = { select: "All Members", members: this.props.members.map((group) => { return (
{group[0].name}
{group[0].jobs}
{group[1].name}
{group[1].jobs}
{group[2].name}
{group[2].jobs}
{group[3].name}
{group[3].jobs}
); }), }; } render() { return
{this.state.members}
; } } export default Members;
